name: MatchaGatcha
description:
Made for the St. Gregory Jam, as a gift for Oliminor

Most of the Match-3 game UI uses sprites I got in a bundle: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/frozen-gui-pack-51624

Good Card Artwork was made by BeeBopBop

All programming and Bad Card Artwork was made by me.

Controls: 
- Click to swap adjacent gems and get points 
- Bigger matches get more points 
- Points unlock a random Gallery Card, collect all 5
